## ImageCache.loadImage() method

Load an \[\[ImageItem\]\]. If the loading process is already running, it returns the current promise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadImage(imageItem: ImageItem): ImageItem | Promise<ImageItem | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageItem | [ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) | <code>ImageItem</code> containing the URL to load image from. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| Promise&lt;[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md) \| undefined&gt;

An \[\[ImageItem\]\] if the image has already been loaded, a promise otherwise.
